fact.description: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Wilmar Roldan signals a free kick to Algeria in their own half.
Wilmar Roldan signals a free kick to Algeria.
In Porto Alegre Algeria attack through Sofiane Feghouli. The finish is off target, however.
Wilmar Roldan awards South Korea a goal kick.
Can Algeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in South Korea's half?
Yacine Brahimi of Algeria gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a South Korea goal kick.
Free kick South Korea.
Wilmar Roldan signals a Algeria throw-in in South Korea's half.
Corner awarded to Algeria.
Algeria have been awarded a corner by Wilmar Roldan.
Islam Slimani's header is off-target for Algeria.
South Korea have a goal kick.
Throw-in for South Korea in their own half.
Algeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Goal kick for Algeria at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Wilmar Roldan signals a free kick to South Korea.
Corner awarded to South Korea.
Throw-in Algeria.
Ball safe as Algeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.

Algeria to take a throw-in in South Korea territory.

Free kick South Korea.
Algeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Algeria's Abdelmoumene Djabou misses with an attempt on goal.
Wilmar Roldan awards South Korea a goal kick.
Wilmar Roldan signals a free kick to Algeria.
Can Algeria capitalize from this throw-in deep inside South Korea's half?
Algeria are pushing forward but Carl Medjani's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for South Korea at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Can South Korea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?
South Korea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wilmar Roldan signals a South Korea throw-in in Algeria's half.
In Porto Alegre Algeria's Islam Slimani is caught offside.
Carl Medjani instrumental with a fine assist.
Yacine Brahimi (Algeria) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Algeria have been awarded a corner by Wilmar Roldan.
That's a fine assist from Abdelmoumene Djabou.
Ball goes out of play for a Algeria goal kick.
Wilmar Roldan waits before resuming play because Islam Slimani for Algeria is still down.
Play has been resumed.
Islam Slimani for Algeria is back on the field again.
South Korea to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
Ball safe as South Korea is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick in a good position for South Korea!
South Korea have a dangerous throw-in.
Algeria have a goal kick.
Algeria have been awarded a corner by Wilmar Roldan.
Great play from Islam Slimani to set up the goal.
Wilmar Roldan signals a free kick to Algeria in their own half.
Can Algeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in South Korea's half?

Algeria attack but Islam Slimani's header doesn't find the target.

Algeria to take a throw-in in South Korea territory.
Throw-in for South Korea at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in for Algeria in their own half.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the first half.
Ball safe as Algeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The first-half has ended.
Wilmar Roldan signals a free kick to South Korea just outside Algeria's area.
Wilmar Roldan signals a free kick to South Korea.
Suk Young Yoon with an assist there.
Wilmar Roldan signals a Algeria throw-in in South Korea's half.
Algeria are in shooting range from this free kick.
Wilmar Roldan blows against South Korea's Ja Cheol Koo for offside.
Free kick Algeria.
South Korea's Yong Lee has been booked in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in South Korea.
South Korea have been awarded a corner by Wilmar Roldan.
Wilmar Roldan signals a South Korea throw-in in Algeria's half.
Algeria will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from South Korea.
Wilmar Roldan signals a throw-in for South Korea, close to Algeria's area.
Myung Bo Hong (South Korea) is making a first substitution, with Shin Wook Kim replacing Chu Young Park.
Can South Korea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?
South Korea to take a throw-in in Algeria territory.
Wilmar Roldan signals a South Korea throw-in in Algeria's half.
South Korea's Sung Yueng Ki is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to South Korea.

Sofiane Feghouli with an assist there.
Wilmar Roldan signals a free kick to South Korea.
Keun Ho Lee is replacing Chung Yong Lee for South Korea at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Corner awarded to South Korea.
Algeria to take a throw-in in South Korea territory.
Can Algeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in South Korea's half?
Wilmar Roldan signals a free kick to South Korea.
Madjid Bougherra for Algeria has been booked by Wilmar Roldan and receives a first yellow card.
Can South Korea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?

South Korea surge into the attack at Estadio Beira-Rio but Shin Wook Kims header is off-target.

South Korea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Algeria get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in South Korea's half?
Algeria have a goal kick.
Algeria awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Algeria make their second substitution with Mehdi Lacen replacing Yacine Brahimi.
South Korea needs to be cautious. Algeria have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in South Korea.
Myung Bo Hong is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Dong Won Ji replacing Kook Young Han.
Throw-in for Algeria close to the penalty box.
Nabil Ghilas (Algeria) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Wilmar Roldan awards South Korea a goal kick.
Free kick Algeria.
Ball safe as Algeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick South Korea.
Throw-in for South Korea close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to South Korea.
Throw-in for Algeria in their own half.
South Korea awarded a free kick in their own half.
Attention is being given to Algerias Islam Slimani and play has been suspended briefly.
Play has been resumed at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Islam Slimani returns to the field for Algeria after picking up a slight injury.
Algeria to take a throw-in in South Korea territory.
South Korea's Keun Ho Lee breaks free at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Algeria goal kick.
Wilmar Roldan signals a free kick to South Korea.
Wilmar Roldan signals a throw-in for South Korea, close to Algeria's area.
Heung Min Son (South Korea) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Goal kick for South Korea at Estadio Beira-Rio.
South Korea's Dong Won Ji gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Wilmar Roldan awards Algeria a goal kick.
Vahid Halilhodzic is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Esseid Belkalem replacing Madjid Bougherra.
Throw-in for South Korea at Estadio Beira-Rio.
4 minutes will be added to the second half.
South Korea awarded a throw-in in their own half.
South Korea have been awarded a corner by Wilmar Roldan.
Ball safe as Algeria is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can South Korea get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Algeria's half?
Wilmar Roldan signals a Algeria throw-in in South Korea's half.
Wilmar Roldan signals a free kick to Algeria.
Algeria to take a throw-in in South Korea territory.
Wilmar Roldan blows to end the match. The final score is 2-4.
